title: How to Make Monkey Munch

steps.headline: Measure Chex cereal and place in large mixing bowl.
Microwave 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 1/2 cup peanut butter, and 1/4 cup butter or margarine in any microwavable bowl for 1 minute (uncovered).
Microwave about 30 seconds longer or until mixture can be stirred smooth.
steps.description: Stir in 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract/essence.

steps.headline: Pour mixture over cereal, stirring until evenly coated.
Pour into 2 gallon (7.6 L) resealable food-storage plastic bag.
Add 1 1/2 cups powdered sugar.
steps.description: Seal bag; shake until well coated.

steps.headline: Spread on waxed paper to cool.
steps.description: Store in airtight container in refrigerator.

steps.headline: May be reheated in the microwave for a future snack.
Put as much Chex as you would like into a bowl.
Add some of the chocolate sauce into the bowl with the Chex.
steps.description: Mix the two together, combining completely.

steps.headline: Add the cocoa powder to the bowl.
steps.description: Mix well, allowing the cocoa powder to soak up all the stickiness.

text: Monkey Munch Measure Chex cereal and place in large mixing bowl. Set aside. Microwave 1 cup semisweet chocolate chips, 1/2 cup peanut butter, and 1/4 cup butter or margarine in any microwavable bowl for 1 minute (uncovered).  Stir.  Microwave about 30 seconds longer or until mixture can be stirred smooth. Stir in 1 teaspoon of vanilla extract/essence. Pour mixture over cereal, stirring until evenly coated.  Pour into 2 gallon (7.6 L) resealable food-storage plastic bag.  Add 1 1/2 cups powdered sugar. Seal bag; shake until well coated. Spread on waxed paper to cool. Store in airtight container in refrigerator. May be reheated in the microwave for a future snack.  Finished.  Simple Monkey Munch Put as much Chex as you would like into a bowl.  Add some of the chocolate sauce into the bowl with the Chex. Mix the two together, combining completely. Add the cocoa powder to the bowl. Mix well, allowing the cocoa powder to soak up all the stickiness. Let sit until dry.  Serve and enjoy.
